name: tapestry-highlights
description: A web page highlighting library supporting overlapping highlights.

scripts.build-e2e-and-serve: npm run build-e2e && npm run dev-server
scripts.check-all: time (npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run format-check && npm test) || { echo 'Checks failed'; exit 1; }
scripts.package: npm run build && cp src/rotation-colors.scss dist && npm pack
scripts.test-ci: echo Playwright tests are run separately from the CI checks job
scripts.test-snapshots: time (docker build -t playwright-screenshots -f playwright-screenshots.dockerfile . && docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/e2e:/tapestry-highlights/e2e playwright-screenshots)
scripts.test-update-snapshots: docker build -t playwright-screenshots -f playwright-screenshots.dockerfile . && docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/e2e:/tapestry-highlights/e2e playwright-screenshots npx playwright test --update-snapshots
